about_the_game:
• Unique armoured car “Eater of Ravagers”
  • Weapon: unique pulse rifle “R-37-39 Adapter” (2 pcs.), turret “DT Cobra”
  • Epic cabin “Humpback” with a unique CK “Inner demon”
  • Unique decor: “EYE”, “Hydraulic lines” (3 pcs.), “Hydraulic adapter” (2 pcs.)
  • 2000 in-game coins

Additionally, the player gets:
  • Epic engine “Hot red”
  • “APC wheel” (6 pcs.)
  • APC structural parts
  • Unique character portrait “Cache”
  • Unique sticker “Contagion”
  • Unique paint can “Ravager plating”
  • Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55

Ravagers, the mysterious machines that invaded the Valley, erased people's memories on a great scale. Cache was one of their victims. Luckily, a group of brave survivors recovered the stolen memories, but the process wasn't smooth for everyone.

Cache developed anterograde amnesia, his brain became practically incapable of moving information from short-term to long-term memory. He remembers the day when his memories returned to him and what had happened to him before. But he barely remembers the following events. And so each time, waking up, Cache is full of determination to take revenge on the Ravagers for what they did. Again and again.

The unique armoured cars presented in packs are known for their perfect balance of weapons, armour and speed in combat. To put the car in the garage, after starting the game, open the blueprint menu, go to the “Packs” tab, select the desired armoured car and press the “Assemble” button.

When you purchase this pack, the number of parts that can be used to build a vehicle increases to 55.

Buying the pack also gives early access to several faction-specific structural parts. These parts become available immediately upon purchase and are not issued again upon reaching the appropriate reputation level. Some parts are unique and can only exist in a single copy. When simultaneously buying a standard and deluxe pack the constructional parts and portraits are not duplicated

Unique portraits provide an excellent opportunity to stand out among the survivors.

Paint cans are a way to make your armoured car different from the pack.

Coins — is the in-game currency, which is used on the market to purchase armoured car parts from other survivors and to pay for the rent of part-building workbenches. Attention! When buying multiple packs, the acquired coins stack!

name: Crossout - Polymorph pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit/ Windows® 11
  • Processor: 4-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A D3D11-compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit/ Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 and higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1060 or Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: This pack includes:Unique armoured car “Eater of Ravagers”Weapon: unique pulse rifle “R-37-39 Adapter” (2 pcs.), turret “DT Cobra”Epic cabin “Humpback” with a unique CK “Inner demon”Unique decor: “EYE”, “Hydraulic lines” (3 pcs.), “Hydraulic adapter” (2 pcs.
supported_languages: English, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Thai, French
